explains: adj. 过分简单化的；过分单纯化的

sentences.en: He has a simplistic view of the treatment of eczema.
sentences.cn: 他对湿疹治疗所持观点过于简单化。

sentences.en: But such simplistic advice is impossible to follow.
sentences.cn: 但这种过于简单的建议是不可能被采用的。

sentences.en: A stereotype is a simplistic or exaggerated image that humans carrying in their minds about groups of people.
sentences.cn: 刻板印象是指人们头脑中对一群人的简单或夸张的印象。
